May 17, 1950
To: All NAEB Officers and Directors
From: Richard B. Hull
Enclosed is a copy of a letter written to
Mr. George Halsey of our staff by FCC secretary
Slowie which lista all of the 10 watt FM stations.
May I suggest that regional directors solicit
those of these stations in your area who are not
now members. Hon members are cheoked in red on
this memorandum.
Mr. Halsey is making a study of 10 watt sta¬
tion's which will be forthcoming' sometime in the
next two or three months.

WNAD, University of

Missouri, Kansas, Colorado, New

Representing non-commercial, educational AM, FM, and TV radio stations, workshops, and production centers,
owned and operated by schools, colleges, universities, and public-service agencies.
